sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from JXDX_JJKHQY JXDX_JJKHQY where 1=1 and JXDX_JJKHQY.QYRQ = $QYRQ$ and jjzh > $QSRQ$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select max(qsrq) from dxgx_yjgx_jj where 1=1 and QYRQ = $QYRQ$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select jjzh from JXDX_JJKHQY where 1=1 and QYRQ = $QYRQ$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select min(qsrq) from dxgx_yjgx_jj gx where 1=1 and gx.QYRQ = $QYRQ$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select JXDX_JJKHQY.KHMC as KHMC,JXDX_JJKHQY.QYRQ as QYRQ,JXDX_JJKHQY.JJZH as JJZH,JXDX_JJKHQY.KHH as KHH,khdx_jg.JGMC as JGMC ,case when gxyj.jjzh is null then '无关系' else gxyj.DQFPGX end dqfpgx from JXDX_JJKHQY JXDX_JJKHQY left outer join ( select dxgx_yjgx_jj.jjzh, listagg(khdx_hy.hymc||'|'||f_numtochar(dxgx_yjgx_jj.zlbl)||',') as DQFPGX from khdx_hy khdx_hy inner join dxgx_yjgx_jj dxgx_yjgx_jj on dxgx_yjgx_jj.khdxdh=khdx_hy.khdxdh and $sysdate$ between dxgx_yjgx_jj.qsrq and dxgx_yjgx_jj.jsrq group by dxgx_yjgx_jj.jjzh) gxyj on gxyj.jjzh=JXDX_JJKHQY.jjzh inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jg.jgdh=JXDX_JJKHQY.jgdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,$JGKHDXDH$)) qx on qx.khdxdh=khdx_jg.khdxdh where 1=1 and JXDX_JJKHQY.JJZH like '%$JJZH$%'
and JXDX_JJKHQY.QYRQ between 20081231 and $JSRQ$
and JXDX_JJKHQY.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and 29991231
and JXDX_JJKHQY.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and $JSRQ$ order by JXDX_JJKHQY.jjzh

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select JXDX_JJKHQY.KHMC as KHMC,JXDX_JJKHQY.QYRQ as QYRQ,JXDX_JJKHQY.JJZH as JJZH,JXDX_JJKHQY.KHH as KHH,khdx_jg.JGMC as JGMC, F_WM_CONCAT(khdx_hy.hymc || dxgx_yjgx_jj.zlbl) DQFPGX ,case when gxyj.jjzh is null then '无关系' else gxyj.DQFPGX end dqfpgx from JXDX_JJKHQY JXDX_JJKHQY left outer join ( select dxgx_yjgx_jj.jjzh, listagg(khdx_hy.hymc||'|'||f_numtochar(dxgx_yjgx_jj.zlbl)||',') as DQFPGX from khdx_hy khdx_hy inner join dxgx_yjgx_jj dxgx_yjgx_jj on dxgx_yjgx_jj.khdxdh=khdx_hy.khdxdh and $sysdate$ between dxgx_yjgx_jj.qsrq and dxgx_yjgx_jj.jsrq group by dxgx_yjgx_jj.jjzh) gxyj on gxyj.jjzh=JXDX_JJKHQY.jjzh inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jg.jgdh=JXDX_JJKHQY.jgdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,$JGKHDXDH$)) qx on qx.khdxdh=khdx_jg.khdxdh where 1=1 and JXDX_JJKHQY.JJZH like '%$JJZH$%'
and JXDX_JJKHQY.QYRQ between 20081231 and $JSRQ$
and JXDX_JJKHQY.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and 29991231
and JXDX_JJKHQY.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and $JSRQ$ order by JXDX_JJKHQY.jjzh

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) as count from JXDX_JJKHQY JXDX_JJKHQY inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jg.jgdh=JXDX_JJKHQY.jgdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,$JGKHDXDH$)) qx on qx.khdxdh=khdx_jg.khdxdh where 1=1 and JXDX_JJKHQY.JJZH like '%$JJZH$%'
and JXDX_JJKHQY.QYRQ between 20081231 and $JSRQ$
and JXDX_JJKHQY.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and 29991231
and JXDX_JJKHQY.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and $JSRQ$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) as count from JXDX_JJKHQY JXDX_JJKHQY inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jg.jgdh=JXDX_JJKHQY.jgdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,$JGKHDXDH$)) qx on qx.khdxdh=khdx_jg.khdxdh where 1=1 and JXDX_JJKHQY.JJZH like '%$JJZH$%'
and JXDX_JJKHQY.QYRQ between 20081231 and $JSRQ$
and JXDX_JJKHQY.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and 29991231
and JXDX_JJKHQY.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and $JSRQ$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select distinct khdx_jg.JGDH as JGDH,khdx_hy.HYMC as HYMC,JXDX_JJKHQY.QYRQ,khdx_hy.HYDH as HYDH,DXGX_YJGX_JJ.QSRQ as QSRQ,DXGX_YJGX_JJ.JSRQ as JSRQ,KHDX_JG.JGMC as JGMC,DXGX_YJGX_JJ.ZLBL as ZLBL ,case when gxyj.jjzh is null then '无关系' else gxyj.DQFPGX end dqfpgx from dxgx_yjgx_jj dxgx_yjgx_jj inner join JXDX_JJKHQY JXDX_JJKHQY on 1=1 and JXDX_JJKHQY.QYRQ=dxgx_yjgx_jj.QYRQ inner join khdx_hy khdx_hy on dxgx_yjgx_jj.khdxdh=khdx_hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy khdx_jgcy on khdx_hy.khdxdh=khdx_jgcy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jgcy.jgkhdxdh=khdx_jg.khdxdh and $sysdate$ between khdx_jgcy.qsrq and khdx_jgcy.jsrq inner join KHDX_JG KHDX_JG780 on KHDX_JG780.JGDH=JXDX_JJKHQY.JGDH where 1=1 and dxgx_yjgx_jj.QYRQ = $QYRQ$ order by dxgx_yjgx_jj.qsrq

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from (select distinct khdx_jg.JGDH as JGDH,khdx_hy.HYMC as HYMC,JXDX_JJKHQY.QYRQ,khdx_hy.HYDH as HYDH,DXGX_YJGX_JJ.QSRQ as QSRQ,DXGX_YJGX_JJ.JSRQ as JSRQ,KHDX_JG.JGMC as JGMC,DXGX_YJGX_JJ.ZLBL as ZLBL ,case when gxyj.jjzh is null then '无关系' else gxyj.DQFPGX end dqfpgx from dxgx_yjgx_jj dxgx_yjgx_jj inner join JXDX_JJKHQY JXDX_JJKHQY on 1=1 and JXDX_JJKHQY.QYRQ=dxgx_yjgx_jj.QYRQ inner join khdx_hy khdx_hy on dxgx_yjgx_jj.khdxdh=khdx_hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy khdx_jgcy on khdx_hy.khdxdh=khdx_jgcy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jgcy.jgkhdxdh=khdx_jg.khdxdh and $sysdate$ between khdx_jgcy.qsrq and khdx_jgcy.jsrq inner join KHDX_JG KHDX_JG780 on KHDX_JG780.JGDH=JXDX_JJKHQY.JGDH where 1=1 and dxgx_yjgx_jj.QYRQ = $QYRQ$ order by dxgx_yjgx_jj.qsrq) a
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from dxgx_yjgx_jj where 1=1 and QYRQ = $QYRQ$ and jsrq=29991231
sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dxgx_yjgx_jj set jsrq=$BEFORE$ where 1=1 and QYRQ = $QYRQ$ and qsrq=(select max(qsrq) from dxgx_yjgx_jj where 1=1 and QYRQ = $QYRQ$)
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dxgx_yjgx_jj set jsrq=$BEFORE$ where 1=1 and QYRQ = $QYRQ$ and jsrq=29991231
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from dxgx_yjgx_jj gx where 1=1 and gx.QYRQ = $QYRQ$ and gx.jsrq=29991231
sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dxgx_yjgx_jj set jsrq=29991231 where 1=1 and QYRQ = $QYRQ$ and jsrq=(select max(jsrq) from dxgx_yjgx_jj where 1=1 and QYRQ = $QYRQ$)
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ insert into XTB_HYGXJL_JJ(jldh,ggbz,khdxdh,qsrq,jsrq,zlbl) select $jldh$,'$ggbz$',gx.khdxdh,gx.qsrq,gx.jsrq,gx.zlbl from dxgx_yjgx_jj gx where 1=1 and gx.QYRQ = $QYRQ$ and jsrq=29991231
